page.body:
Michael Ramos
Finance and Accounts

Mike is a numbers guy and the accounts are kept up-to-date by Michael's forensic knowledge and accounting and finance skills. The cautious and risk averse approach to business has a lot to do with the way in which Mike runs the numbers.

Mike is a logical thinker and researcher. He gets stressed when he has short deadlines and is extremely uncomfortable with change. He is constantly searching for the value-add to the business to leave his mark.
